get_sources <- function(category = NULL,
                        api_key = NULL) {
  if(!is.null(category)){
    if(length(category) > 1){
      stop("You cannot enter more than one category.")
    }
    stop_throws(category)
  }
  if (is.null(api_key)){
    stop(paste0("No API Key!"))
  }
  params <- list(category = category,
                       language = "en",
                       country  = "us")
  url <- get_url("https://newsapi.org/v2/sources", params)
  response <- get_request(url, api_key)
  
  content_parsed <- parse_content(response)
  if(is.null(content_parsed$sources)){
    content_parsed$totalResults <- 0
  } else {
    content_parsed$totalResults <- nrow(content_parsed$sources)
  }
  metadata <- extract_metadata(response, content_parsed)
  sources_df <- extract_sources(metadata, content_parsed)
  source_names <- c("cnn", "fox-news", "the-wall-street-journal", "reuters")
  sources_df <- sources_df %>% filter(sources_df$id %in% source_names)
  return(sources_df)
}
get_url <- function(url, query_args){
  url <- httr::parse_url(url = url)
  url$scheme <- "https"
  url$query <- query_args
  return(url)
}
get_request <- function(url, api_key){
  results <- httr::GET(url, httr::add_headers("X-Api-Key" = api_key))
  return(results)
}
parse_content <- function(response){
  content_text <- httr::content(response, "text")
  content_parsed <- jsonlite::fromJSON(content_text)
  return(content_parsed)
}
extract_metadata <- function(response, content_parsed, page = NULL, page_size = NULL){
  metadata <- data.frame(total_results = content_parsed$totalResults, 
                         status_code   = response$status_code,
                         request_date  = response$date,
                         request_url   = response$url,
                         code          = ifelse(response$status_code !=200, 
                                                content_parsed$code, 
                                                ""),
                         message       = ifelse(response$status_code !=200,
                                                content_parsed$message, 
                                                ""),
                         stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
  if(!is.null(page)){
    metadata$page <- page
  }
  if(!is.null(page_size)){
    metadata$page_size <- page_size
  }
  return(metadata)
}
extract_sources <- function(metadata, content_parsed){
  empty_df <- data.frame()
  if (metadata$status_code == 200) {
    if(metadata$total_results > 0){
      return(content_parsed$sources)
    } else {
      warning(paste0("The search was unsuccessful!"))
      return(empty_df)
    }
  } else {
    warning(paste0("Error message: ",
                   metadata$message))
    return(empty_df)
  }
}
category_names <- c("business", "entertainment", "general", "health","science","sports","technology")
stop_throws <- function(category){
  if (!category %in% category_names) {
    stop(paste0(category, " is not a valid category. "))
  }
}

get_headlines <- function(q = NULL, 
                          sources         = NULL,
                          page_size = 100,
                          page = 1,
                          api_key   = NULL){
  if (all(sapply(list(sources, q), is.null))) {
    stop(paste0("Please provide at least either sources or query."))
  }
  if(!is.null(q)){
    if(length(q) > 1){
      stop("You can only specify one q.")
    }
  }
source_names <- c("cnn", "fox-news", "the-wall-street-journal", "reuters")
stop_throws_source <- function(source){
  if (!source %in% source_names) { 
    stop(paste0(source, " is not a valid source name. "))
  }
}
  if(!is.numeric(page)) {
    stop("Please enter a number.")
  }
  if (is.null(api_key)){
    stop(paste0("No API Key!"))
  }
  if(!is.null(sources)){
    sapply(sources, stop_throws_source)
  }    
  if(!is.numeric(page_size)) {
    stop("You need to enter the number of texts per page.")
  } 
  else if(page_size > 100) {
    stop("Page size cannot not exceed 100 articles per page.")
  }
get_url <- function(url, query_args){
url <- httr::parse_url(url = url)
url$scheme <- "https"
url$query <- query_args
return(url)
}
get_request <- function(url, api_key){
  results <- httr::GET(url, httr::add_headers("X-Api-Key" = api_key))
  return(results)
}
parse_content <- function(response){
  content_text    <- httr::content(response, "text")
  content_parsed  <- jsonlite::fromJSON(content_text)
  return(content_parsed)
}
extract_metadata <- function(response, content_parsed, page = NULL, page_size = NULL){
  metadata <- data.frame(total_results = content_parsed$totalResults, 
                         status_code   = response$status_code,
                         request_date  = response$date,
                         request_url   = response$url,
                         code          = ifelse(response$status_code !=200, 
                                                content_parsed$code, 
                                                ""),
                         message       = ifelse(response$status_code !=200,
                                                content_parsed$message, 
                                                ""),
                         stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
  if(!is.null(page)){
    metadata$page <- page
  }
  if(!is.null(page_size)){
    metadata$page_size <- page_size
  }
  return(metadata)
}
  params <- list(
                    sources   = sources,
                    q         = q,
                    pageSize  = page_size,
                    page      = page)
  url <- get_url("https://newsapi.org/v2/top-headlines", params)
  response <- get_request(url = url, api_key = api_key)
  content_parsed <- parse_content(response)
  if(is.null(content_parsed$totalResults)){
    content_parsed$totalResults <- 0
  }
  metadata <- extract_metadata(response, content_parsed, page, page_size)
  results_df = extract_articles(metadata = metadata, content_parsed = content_parsed)
  results_df <- results_df %>% filter(results_df$id %in% source_names)
  return(results_df)
}
extract_articles <- function(metadata, content_parsed){
  empty_df <- data.frame()
  if (metadata$status_code == 200) {
    if(metadata$total_results > 0){
      results_df        <- content_parsed$articles
      results_df$id     <- unlist(results_df$source$id)
      results_df$name   <- unlist(results_df$source$name)
      results_df$source <- NULL
      return(results_df)
    } else {
      warning(paste0("The search was not successful. There were no results"))
      return(empty_df)      
    }
  } else {
    warning(paste0("The search resulted in the following error:" , 
                   metadata$message))
    return(empty_df)
  }
}

  }

  }

collapse_to_comma_separated <- function(v){
  return(paste(v, collapse = ","))
}
if (!is.null(sources)) {
    if (length(sources) > 4) {
      stop("You cannot specify more than 4 sources.")
    }
    sources <- collapse_to_comma_separated(sources)
}

  if (is.null(api_key))
    stop(
      paste0("No API Key!"
      )
    )
  lubridate_orders <- c("ymdHMs","ymdHMsz", "ymd")
  lubridate_orders_string <- paste(lubridate_orders, collapse = ", ")
  
  if (!is.null(from)) {
    from_parsed <- lubridate::parse_date_time(from, lubridate_orders, quiet = TRUE)
    if (is.na(from_parsed)) {
      stop(paste0("From argument needs conform to one of the following lubridate orders: ", 
                  lubridate_orders_string, ". See help for lubridate::parse_date_time. ", 
                  "If in doubt, use %Y-%m-%d for a date or %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S for datetime."))
    }
    from <- format(from_parsed, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S")
  }
  if (!is.null(to)) {
    to_parsed <- lubridate::parse_date_time(to, lubridate_orders, quiet = TRUE)
    if (is.na(to_parsed)) {
      stop(paste0("To argument needs conform to one of the following lubridate orders: ", 
                  lubridate_orders_string, ". See help for lubridate::parse_date_time. ", 
                  "If in doubt, use %Y-%m-%d for a date or %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S for datetime."))
    }
    to <- format(to_parsed, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S")
  }
  params <- list(
    q              = q,
    qInTitle = q_title,
    language        = "en",
    sources         = sources,
    from            = from,
    to              = to,
    sortBy          = sort_by,
    pageSize        = page_size,
    page            = page
  )

}
